sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.Password2AjaxSupport</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>Password2AjaxSupport</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var Password2AjaxSupport = Class.create();
Password2AjaxSupport.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
   getClearPassword2: function() {
	 var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_name');
	 var fieldName = this.getParameter('sysparm_field_name');
	 var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
     return GlideEncryptionUtil.getClearPassword2(tableName,fieldName,sysId);
   }
});
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-06-30 22:21:34</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>30bf3b32d7212100f20bc8170e610391</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Password2AjaxSupport</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_30bf3b32d7212100f20bc8170e610391</sys_update_name>
